description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to remove condition 13 (connection to future heating network) of planning permission P082373 dated 27 February 2009 for the 'Conversion of a vacant hostel to self-contained residential accommodation comprising a total of 14 no. units (8 no. 5-bedroom, 2 no. 2-bedroom wheelchair accessible units, and 4 no. 1-bedroom units - 100% affordable housing); reconfiguration of the front garden to provide new stairs to 8 no. upper floor units, stairs and ramp to lower ground floor and refuse storage; provision of stair access to rear gardens; alteration to fenestration in both front and rear elevations; replacement of front boundary wall and gates; and the felling of 6 trees within both the front and rear gardens (and replacement planting).
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE: Should the applicant wish to resubmit this application, it must be accompanied by an agreement to link the original s106 legal agreement (LBI ref: P082373 dated 27 February 2009) to this application. Or to agree to the heads of terms agreed to within the original planning application (P082373). This must include provision of the applicant's solicitors details and agreement to pay the Council's legal fees in the preparation of this agreement.
